content:
Â« Gecko Roles Page

A scroll pane, which is an object that allows a user to incrementally view a large amount of information. Its children can include scroll bars and a viewport. Also refer to ROLE_VIEW_PORT.

Mapped to

  • AT-SPI: ROLE_SCROLL_PANE
  • ATK: ATK_ROLE_SCROLL_PANE
  • UA: NSAccessibilityScrollAreaRole
  • MSAA: USE_ROLE_STRING
  • IA2: IA2_ROLE_SCROLL_PANE

Used by

Not used.
title: ROLE_SCROLL_PANE
